welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fairview Heights! This charming city is known for its friendly locals, delicious cuisine, and unique shopping experiences. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Fairview Heights has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Belleville Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves all airlines and offers a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves several regional airlines and offers a smaller, more intimate atmosphere for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the prompts to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport, where all commercial flights are operated from.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Spirit Of St Louis Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
